name: Oil Change
description: Replace engine oil and filter to maintain engine lubrication and prevent wear.

name: Oil Change
description: Replace engine oil and filter. Commercial diesel engines require more frequent service due to heavy use.

name: Tire Rotation
description: Rotate tires to ensure even wear and extend tire life.

name: Tire Inspection
description: Inspect all tires for wear, damage, and proper inflation. Check tread depth and sidewalls.

name: Engine Air Filter
description: Replace engine air filter to ensure clean air intake for optimal combustion.

name: Cabin Air Filter
description: Replace cabin air filter to maintain clean air inside the vehicle.

name: Brake Pads
description: Inspect and replace brake pads to ensure safe stopping power.

name: Brake Rotors
description: Inspect and resurface or replace brake rotors for optimal braking.

name: Transmission Fluid
description: Replace transmission fluid to ensure smooth gear shifts and prevent wear.

name: Transmission Fluid
description: Replace transmission fluid in manual or automated manual transmission.

name: Coolant Flush
description: Flush and replace engine coolant to prevent overheating and corrosion.

name: Spark Plugs
description: Replace spark plugs to maintain proper engine ignition and fuel efficiency.

name: Serpentine Belt
description: Inspect and replace serpentine belt to prevent accessory failure.

name: Timing Belt
description: Replace timing belt to prevent catastrophic engine damage.

name: Battery
description: Test and replace battery to ensure reliable starting.

name: Power Steering Fluid
description: Replace power steering fluid to maintain smooth steering operation.

name: Brake Fluid
description: Flush and replace brake fluid to maintain braking performance.

name: Differential Fluid
description: Replace differential fluid to ensure proper lubrication of gears.

name: Wiper Blades
description: Replace wiper blades for clear visibility in rain and snow.

name: Fuel Filter
description: Replace fuel filter to ensure clean fuel delivery to the engine.

name: Wheel Alignment
description: Check and adjust wheel alignment to prevent uneven tire wear.

name: A/C Service
description: Inspect A/C system and recharge refrigerant as needed.

name: Suspension Inspection
description: Inspect shocks, struts, and suspension components for wear.

name: Transfer Case Fluid
description: Replace transfer case fluid in 4WD and AWD vehicles to ensure smooth operation.

name: Front Differential Fluid
description: Replace front differential fluid in 4WD vehicles for proper lubrication.

name: U-Joint Inspection
description: Inspect universal joints for wear and lubricate as needed.

name: Trailer Hitch Inspection
description: Inspect trailer hitch, wiring, and brake controller for proper operation.

name: DEF Fluid
description: Refill Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) to maintain emissions compliance.

name: DPF Regeneration Check
description: Monitor and ensure proper DPF regeneration cycles for diesel particulate filter.

name: Air Brake Inspection
description: Inspect air brake system including compressor, tanks, valves, and chambers.

name: Brake Adjustment
description: Adjust slack adjusters and check brake stroke for proper operation.

name: Air Dryer Service
description: Replace air dryer desiccant cartridge to prevent moisture in air system.

name: Fifth Wheel Service
description: Lubricate fifth wheel plate and inspect locking mechanism.

name: Kingpin Inspection
description: Measure kingpin wear and inspect for damage or deformation.

name: DOT Annual Inspection
description: Complete DOT annual inspection as required by FMCSA regulations.

name: Drive Axle Service
description: Change differential oil in drive axles and inspect for leaks.

name: Steer Axle Service
description: Inspect steering components, king pins, and lubricate tie rod ends.

name: Clutch Adjustment
description: Adjust clutch free play and inspect clutch brake for wear.

name: Turbocharger Inspection
description: Inspect turbocharger for shaft play, leaks, and proper boost.

name: Fuel Water Separator
description: Drain water from fuel water separator and replace filter element.

name: EGR System Service
description: Clean or replace EGR valve and cooler to maintain emissions compliance.

name: Injector Service
description: Test and service fuel injectors for proper spray pattern and flow.

name: APU Service
description: Change APU oil and filter, inspect belts and coolant level.

name: Trailer Brake Inspection
description: Inspect trailer brake pads, drums, and electrical connections.
